Preprocess the data by filling numeric NaN values with the median and dropping columns with more than 50% missing data. Use the `cat_features` parameter in CatBoost to handle categorical variables. executor_guidance: Ensure that categorical variables are properly identified and passed to the `cat_features` parameter. Avoid using one-hot encoding or get_dummies for categorical features, as CatBoost handles them natively. Double-check that all missing values are handled before model training.
